attributes.additional_details:
Paedophiles are getting away to many times nowadays

Recently in the news a guy was found with child porn all he got was 200hrs community service disgusting. what about the victims in the videos anyone think how its damaged them no!! the victims are left with the life sentence totally unfair.

paedophiles shouldnt be near children at all. lock them up for good.


I want the government to protect children and hand out longer prison sentences.

community service is just wrong!

child porn or sexual abuse is just wrong. letting them away with it makes yous just as bad as them. Yous are hurting the victims over and over again.



LETS ALL STAND TOGETHER AND HELP PROTECT INNOCENT VICTIMS.

LETS FIGHT FOR HARDER SENTENCES!!!!
